description: Related, led by Jorge Pérez and his sons, Jon Paul and Nick, plan a three-tower development including the 75-story Baccarat-branded condo high-rise and hotel. Baccarat Residences will include 318 condos, eight penthouses and 28 riverfront flats and duplexes, according to Related’s website.
Related Group and Inegra Investments plan one 46-story St. Regis-branded tower totaling roughly 150 condos.
Mast Capital plans a new 80-story condo tower,  the first Cipriani-branded residential building in the U.S. It is expected to have 397 units, according to a press release.

full_address: 18401 Collins Avenue in Sunny Isles Beach
description: Dezer Development plans a 61-story condo tower  with 216 units. Dezer partnered with Bentley Motors to develop the luxury automotive brand’s first residential building in the world.

developers: PMG, Greybrook, Mohari Hospitality, S2 Development and Hilton
description: PMG, Greybook, Mohari Hospitality, S2 Development and Hilton plan the Waldorf Astoria, a 100-story tower with 360 condos and 205 hotel rooms.
